## HSL.lightness() method

Set the lightness value of the color.

```ts
const hsl = HSL.create('hsl(180, 50%, 50%)');
hsl.lightness(100).h //=> 100

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lightness(lightness: number | string): HSL;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lightness | <code>number &#124; string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`HSL`
